attributes.comment:
I believe that this increase is absurd. These families, my wife and I included, are
trying to do the ethical thing and provide loving, caring homes to orphans from
other countries. We are required to disclose information, take lengthy medical
tests, and send a lot of money to become parents. The current procedure of the I-
600a to I-171H is not only expensive, but it expires before we can use it. So now
we have to submit this application twice during the adoption process, doubling our
expense and wasting our time. The whole process should be eliminated or at
least be given without expiration. We have to get these documents to apply and
the recieve the child. Its too much. Please, please, please help those of us who
open our hearts, homes, and checkbooks to share our way of life with a child that
would not gain such access. Don't nickel and dime these wonderful people who
just want to start or expand their families. We as a country are better than this.
Sincerely, Benjamin Carey

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Benjamin Carey
